string-array.name: beltParameters
string-array.item: Takeup...gravity, gravity wire rope, hydraulic, screw:pulleys
Drive...motor HP, speed in FPM, capacity in TPH:pulleys
Layout...lenght in feet, lift in feet, material conveyed:pulleys
Service life...shifts per day, moths per year, pully life in years:pulleys
Quote...bearings type, B10 Life in hours, TU frame, idlers, impact system, ezslider, smart roll:pulleys

Parameters for quoting a pulley...convyeor id, pulley location, quantity, pulley type, OD without laggling, face width, crown or flat face, lagging thickness, lagging groove, lagging specs, shaft diameter at hub, shaft diameter @ HUB, shaft diameter @ BRG, shaft diameter @ DRIVE, # KW, shaft length, bearning center (BC), wrap (arc of contact), T1, T2:pulleys
Desired Take Up Position Before Belt Stretch:tensioningSystem
Desired Take Up Position After Belt Stretch:tensioningSystem
Installed Motor Power Per Drive Pulley:driveSystem
Contact Angle for Drive Pulley One:driveSystem
Contact Angle for Drive Pulley Two:driveSystem
Nearest Muster Station from Splice Location:spliceDetails
Estimated Belt Stretch for this Belt and System:spliceDetails
Is the customer secretly watching you on camera?:spliceDetails
Lockout Details like number of locks and location of pannel:spliceDetails
What are the answers to the questions on the safe work plan?:spliceDetails
The noise level at the splice area.:spliceDetails
Distance from splice area to ground:spliceDetails
Is there edge wear on the belt?:inspection
What is the condition of the splice?:inspection
has material spilled off the belt:inspection
Is there shiney metal where the belt has rubbed the paint and rust off the frame?:inspection
Is there paint rubbed off the structure or idlers? Where and how did it get rubbed off?:inspection
Is the lagging worn off? Has the lagging gotten hard and sticky?:inspection
Is the belting failing where the idlers force it in to an angle?:inspection
Is the belt running fast and partially loaded, or slow and fully loaded:inspection
Is there carryback? How bad is it?:inspection
have water and abrasive particles been entering cuts and grinding of carcass?:inspection
ozone sources: arc welders, electrical generating equipment:inspection
how did the previous belt fail?:inspection
how long did the previous belt life?:inspection
what was the spec fo the previous belt?:inspection
have the operating and environmental conditions changed?:inspection
is there material built up on pulleys?:inspection
Are there any hot or cold repairs made to the belt?:inspection
Is the tail pulley free to spin or is there trapped material around it?:inspection
Is there damage to the tail pulley?:inspection
What is the condition of the skirting in the loading area? Does it need adjustment or replacement?:inspection
Is there damage to the impact bed or impact idlers?:inspection
Is the slider bed clean and smooth?:inspection

Is there damage to the idlers on the carry side? Is there adequate lubrication? Are the idlers numbered for identification? How many and which ones need to be repaired or replaced? Are the defective ones flagged with a plastic ribbon?:inspection
What is the operational status of the carry side trainers? Are they tied off?:inspection
What is the condition of the skirting and the impact bed or idlers in the secondary loading locations?:inspection
Is there damage to the tipper frame?:inspection
Is there buildup around the tipper pulley?:inspection
Is the head and/or drive clean, does it have work lagging, is the rubber old, worn, smooth, or hard?:inspection
Head Pulley Cleaner and Scraper Adjustment:inspection
Operational Status of the Takeup Mechanism:inspection
Operational or Tied Off Return Self Trainers:inspection
Damage to Return Side from Poor Training:inspection
OperationalStatus of Plow or Scraper in front of Tail Pulley:inspection
Has all splicing equipment been removed?:inspection
Are pulley shafts parallel to each other?:inspection
Were belt structure bolts checked for tightness?:inspection
Are belt idlers horizontal, in-line and square with conveyor centerline?:inspection
Have self-training idlers been installed properly?:inspection
Is the reducer oil at the proper level?:inspection
Was the belt chain guard oiled?:inspection
Does the motor have proper rotation?:inspection
Were all tools, installation gear and foreign objects removed from the area?:inspection
Was the belt gravity takeup blocking removed?:inspection
Have belt wipers and skirting been properly adjusted?:inspection
Are pulleys an didlers free of material buildup?:inspection
Is the takeup carriage in good working order?:inspection
Will head and tail pulleys be watched for possible runoff?:inspection
Are belt emergency stop cords installed?:inspection
Is the site goverened by MSHA?:fieldSurvey
If so, it is consitered underground or surface?:fieldSurvey
What is is the shift start time?:fieldSurvey
Are there any restrictions on daily hours?:fieldSurvey
Who will the new belt be strugn by? Designate just one party.:fieldSurvey
Who is going to track the new belt once installed? Designate just one party.:fieldSurvey
Is the conveyor an incline conveyor or a horizontal conveyor?:fieldSurvey
Is it a gravity or screw takeup?:fieldSurvey
Is there catwalk on the conveyor?:fieldSurvey
Is the footage of the conveyor above ground or below ground?:fieldSurvey
Is the conveyor inside or outside?:fieldSurvey
Is there equpment on-site to set the belt rool and maneuver necessary equipment?:fieldSurvey
Is there a manflit on-site that will be accessable if needed?:fieldSurvey
Is the carrying side of the conveyor accessible?:fieldSurvey
Is the return side of the conveyor accessible?:fieldSurvey
Is the tail pulley of the conveyor accessible?:fieldSurvey
What are the min and max material temps, and ambient temps?:fieldSurvey
